1.title: Beginning

choices: waking up from one of your mother's lectures
learning to fly with your mothers and sister
121.content:
A young female pegasi who was created with the use of alicorn magic.
Name Rain Drop
White skin with light sky blue mane and tail
Crystal blue eyes
Cutie mark is a storm cloud with three droplets falling.
Mother is Rainbow Dash
Other mother is Twilight Sparkle
adopted sister is Scootaloo.
Clumsy and care free. Takes long naps at random, more so during Twilight's lectures.
121.title: Pony

1211.content:
Yawning widely you woke up and looked around at your friends as you all sat in the shade of the newly fixed and regrown Ponyvile library. Rubbing your eyes with the tips of your wings you slowly stand up and walk over towards your mother Twilight who had just finished her class for the day. "Mum. Why is it that you always put me to sleep with your speeches and lessons? I mean can't you make them more fun?" You moaned as you stood next to her and she shook her head.

"Your so much like your mother. The two of you never could sit through a story or speech I give." She sighed and pet your mane with her wing. "You are the new element of loyalty. And take to much after the last one. But little of me. It hurts my heart knowing that you don't like books and studying." She stated and you looked up at her.

"I have read every book in the castle library and the ones in this library as well. I have happily added you with many of your studies. I just can't sit and listen, sorry." You lower your head and wonder how you could make her happy.

"I know I was teasing you. I have learned a lot from Dash on how to prank too you know. Go play." She used her magic to pick you up and push you towards your friends. You stumble and sigh as you shook your head walking over to the twins.

Rough Rock and Shiny Rose
Spike's and Rarity's half dragon half unicorn son and daughter.
Rough is male with white scales and green mane and tail.
Shiny is female and is a dark purple scale with a emerald green mane and tail that glimmers and sparkles in any light.

You smiled at them both as you walked up between them and drooped your wings over both of them as the three walked towards the others.
1211.title: waking up from one of your mother's lectures

135.content:
So your a human that was born/raised in Equestria.

Here are three choices for names of human's

1: Charles Schott, (The reason it's spelled like that is because the last name is German) 16 years old,
been a brony since late 2018
Strengths: Almost always nice to people (ponies)
Weakness's: Medium fuse (not one to get angry quickly but don't push it)
Fact's: Loves to sing, favorite pony is Princess Luna


I can't think of any other good ideas for human names.
135.title: Human

info.brief_description: A human is raised in equestria for 16 years and is moving into ponyville...nuff said
info.description: Well since no one is adding to my first story(after about 3 or 4 years of waiting for someone to) I decided to make this story so yeah there's that Anyway rule time. 1. You can if you want to I guess make pairings with anypony but please don't do it with somepony way younger or older than you. (shudders from imagining that). 2. Please don't make chapters short unless necessary(it's so not cool). 3. This story will be told in second person perspective(YOU told your mom you had to eat a cloud for breakfast,YOUR friend is weird). 4. The main character(you of course) will have to be raised by two of the three types of ponies. Other than that your story should be A okay anyway get on with your story or whatever (sorry if this description sounds like crap but I'm typing this in 4:00 in the morning).
